module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: The Skrill fee structure is a competitive 1.2%+0.29 and 1%+0.29 for Instant bank transfer. * Fees apply to new merchants only. From 1st March 2021. *Fees apply to new merchants only within restricted industry sectors. Terms and conditions apply - https://www.skrill.com/en/footer/terms-conditions/fees-reduction-promotion/Free and quick set upActivate credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationTake advantage of the Skrill multicurrency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 375M users
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 375M users. With this free official module, benefit from our advanced commerce platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally.
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any set-up fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 88.7%* thanks to our mobile optimised solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay for their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services.  A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more transactions you receive the less it costs you.  *Conversion rate measured by Comscore online panel, Q4 2017. Analysed shopping behaviour at 20 large merchant sites across categories, utilising its panel of 1 million US consumers.

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep your store up-to-date: benefit from the latest features and improvements available.Protect your store: stay up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Optimize your SEO: enhance your search results on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc.) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines.

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer.
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google Ads, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers.

module.name: productcomments
module.description: Allow users to post reviews on your products and/or rate them based on specific criteria
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Allow users to post reviews on your products and/or rate them based on specific criteria.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Boost your sales: increase your conversion rate with a comments section, helpful to reassure and show your visitors your store is trustworthy.Improve your SEO: search engines will use it to discover new content.Rich snippets: enrich your search engine results by displaying rating stars on your store - it allows you to gain visibility, and therefore increase your traffic.

module.name: dashactivity
module.description: Check in one glance what is happening on your store with a list of KPI on your dashboard
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check in one glance what is happening on your store with a list of KPI on your dashboard.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Handle your stock: keep an eye on your out-of-stock products and be ahead of your needs.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

badge.label: Save time: Partner of the year

module.name: smartsupp
module.displayName: Smartsupp – live chat, chatbots, video recordings
module.description: Smartsupp combines live chat, chatbots, and Facebook Messenger to save your time and help you turn visitors into loyal customers
module.author: Smartsupp
module.description_full: Smartsupp combines live chat, chatbots, and Facebook Messenger to save your time and help you turn visitors into loyal customers.
module.additional_description: Grow and expand your business Smartsupp is your personal shopping assistant. It combines live chat and chatbots to save your time and help you turn visitors into loyal customers. Smartsupp is one of the most popular products in Europe with 50 000 active European webshops and websites. Why choose Smartsupp? The only product that combines live chat, chatbots, and video recordings. Automate repetitive questions, be personal where it's relevant and see where visitors get lost on your webshop.Access real-time visitor list enriched with e-commerce data. See who is browsing your webshop, which products are they interested in and proactively start a conversation to make a sale.The most popular online chat in Europe with more than 50 000 active webshops and websites. We also offer human customer service in 7 different languages.GDPR compliant. We securely store your data in the European Union and comply with strict EU data protection laws. What can Smartsupp do? Live chat, emails and Messenger in one place – start a personal conversation with your customers and have all communication in one place. By helping your visitors instantly, you’ll turn them into happy customers and boost your sales.Chatbot – Smartsupp bot is your new shopping assistant that works 24/7. It’ll save your time by answering frequently asked questions, collecting leads and assisting customers with shopping even while you're asleep.Video recordings – see how your visitors are browsing your webshop or website and where they are getting lost. You’ll get valuable insights on what to improve and ensure a smooth shopping experience for your customers.Mobile app – be closer to your customers with our app for iOS and Android phones and answer questions even when you are in the warehouse or on the go.Visit https://www.smartsupp.com/pricing to get the full list of features. What our users say about us? "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Connect with your visitors and reassure them about secure payment, free shipping or returns
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Connect with your visitors and reassure them about secure payment, free shipping or returns.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Establish a trust relationship: customizable and responsive information blocks offer helpful information to reassure and show to your visitors that your store is trustworthy.Increase your conversion rate: you will make your customers confident about purchasing on your online shop.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Add a banner on your homepage to display sales or new products in a visual and friendly way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add a banner on your homepage to display sales or new products in a visual and friendly way.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Address specific customers: you can create a banner for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Promote seasonal offers: it will help your customers to feel like shopping your products.Highlight an important section of your store: your visitors will probably pay attention to and focus more on your catalog.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Help navigation on your store, show your visitors current category and subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Help navigation on your store, show your visitors current category and subcategories.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop and see available subcategories.Picture the category tree: it is very useful to navigate between category and subcategory pages.Facilitate the search: help your visitors to easily find the items they want. Indeed, they just have to look at the right place, and they will spot it quickly!

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Let your customers know how to reach you, display contact information on your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Let your customers know how to reach you, display contact information on your store.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Stay available: your customers will love to know when and how they can join you, it is always useful!Establish a trust relationship: the contact section of your store is helpful to reassure and show your visitors that your store is trustworthy.

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your customers feel at home on your store, invite them to sign in!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Connect with your customers: create an easy purchasing environment for your clients to make them feel like going back.

module.name: ps_customtext
module.description: Give your visitors extra information, display a customized block of content on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Give your visitors extra information, display a customized block of content on your homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Build your brand image: adding text to your pages allows you to focus your customers on specific aspects of your brand.Address specific customers: you can create content for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.Strengthen your content strategy: provide information and target keywords to reach best search engine results.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_emailsubscription
module.description: Keep in touch with your customers the way you want, add a form to the homepage of your store and allow all the curious to subscribe to your newsletter
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Keep in touch with your customers the way you want, add a form to the homepage of your store and allow all the curious to subscribe to your newsletter.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Handle your customers: retrieve data on your subscribers in one place with email address, main information, etc.Create special offers: offer your subscribers a voucher to stimulate their shopping on your store.

module.name: ps_featuredproducts
module.description: Pick a category and highlight its items, enhance customer experience with a lively homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Pick a category and highlight its items, enhance customer experience with a lively homepage.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Increase your visibility: select what category you want to focus attention on and display a few of its items on your front office.Promote your catalog: your products need special attention, display a part of your catalog via this immediate, one-click access to relevant items to boost your sales.

module.name: ps_imageslider
module.description: Add sliding images to your homepage to welcome your visitors in a visual and friendly way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add sliding images to your homepage to welcome your visitors in a visual and friendly way.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Enhance customer experience: create a lively homepage with both a professional look and your own style! - Promote seasonal offers: it will help your customers to feel like purchasing your products.Highlight an important section of your store: your visitors will probably pay attention to and focus more on your catalog.Succeed your sales: a client who feels welcomed will be more likely to come back shopping on your store.Address specific customers: you can create a banner for a specific language, and then target people from a specific localization.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make it easy for your visitors to find their way on your store, select the right link and turn it into a menu item.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ease navigation on your store: make it simple for your customer to browse your shop while keeping an eye on its menu.Increase your visibility: select content and keywords you want to highlight and focus on your SEO.

module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: ps_googleanalytics

module.author: PrestaShop

module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Retrieve data: these current values are essential to analyze your business and make it evolve in the right direction.Analyze your visitors' behavior: be able to retrace all the stops your customers take on the road to action on your store.Gain new customers: read this data as a measurable way to improve your campaigns and reach new audiences.

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: cleverppc
module.displayName: Ads Clever - Google Ads & Google Shopping
module.description: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network.
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Google Shopping campaigns: We create, manage and optimize your Google Shopping campaigns.Search campaigns: Be seen by customers as they search on Google.Display campaigns: Display Banners & Text Ads to reach people interested in your products.Remarketing and Dynamic Remarketing campaigns: Follow your own visitors through the internet offering your products once they leave your site. Benefits for your store:Maximize your marketing budget: Clever Google Ads app adjust bids with algorithms to ensure the best results.Attract the right customers to your store: We take the customers to your store in the very moment they are looking for your products on Google.Increase your ROI: Start getting potential customers at the lowest CPC and maximize your ROI!Get qualified traffic: Stop wasting money on useless clicks and start getting relevant traffic.Campaigns automatization: Our algorithm will learn the best way to help optimizing your campaigns through our technology of machine learning.

module.name: cedwish
module.description: The official Wish integration makes it easier than ever to list and sell your products on the world's leading mobile e-commerce platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The official Wish integration makes it easier than ever to list and sell your products on the world's leading mobile e-commerce platform.
module.additional_description: The Wish module will empower you to become a global seller with ease—just create a single product listing to reach customers in more than 100 countries.  Wish is the most downloaded app globally for three of the past four years, Wish provides merchants with easy access to more than 100 million monthly active users across the globe (source: Sensor Tower). Unlike most marketplaces more than 70% of sales on Wish do not originate from search queries. Wish’s unique algorithm helps find the users that are most likely to buy your products—and we place your products front and center for them.

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

module.name: ps_themecusto
module.description: Easily build your homepage: access the main front office modules and quickly configure them
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: ps_metrics
module.description: PrestaShop Metrics gives you key insights to help you pilot your business growth, fast and easy without leaving your back office
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PrestaShop Metrics gives you key insights to help you pilot your business growth, fast and easy without leaving your back office. Whether you are just starting with your e-commerce or you already have experience , this data management solution is for you!
module.additional_description: Take control of your ecommerce statisticsAn intuitive and easy to use dashboard that saves time, no more switching between different applicationsSynchronization with Google Analytics: Easily install of a Google Analytics Tag and synchronize with your account to retrieve reliable traffic dataCross-reference sales, orders, shopping carts and traffic data from the most reliable sources such as Google Analytics or your PrestaShop online store in a single interfaceCompare your periods of activity by visualizing your performance over 3 months of data history and up to 14 months for the Advanced version. Save time with a revamped interfaceYour key figures grouped in a way that makes it easier to read and to analyze themTraffic detailed by acquisition channelUnderstandable, usable, and relevant data Turn insights into actionsGet easy to implement advice and recommendations from our e-commerce experts, which will allow you to optimize your shop's activity and your key indicators SecurityYour data is protected and access is secured from your PrestaShop back office.PrestaShop Metrics calculations intelligently focus on the essential data, and calculate your traffic data in advance, thus maintaining the speed of your shop. PrestaShop Metrics Advanced EXPLOIT YOUR KPIs TO THE FULLEST • Update your data in real time and monitor the daily progress of your business. • Push your analysis to the next level thanks to up to 14 months' worth of data. • Gain additional insight from your Customer Activity, Acquisition and Behaviour tabs and get a comprehensive overview of the growth of your business.

module.name: ps_accounts
module.description: Prestashop Account
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Prestashop Account

module.name: bluepayment
module.description: Blue Media S.A. BluePayment plugin enables quick and secure acceptance of online payments by e-sellers using PrestaShop software
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Blue Media S.A. BluePayment plugin enables quick and secure acceptance of online payments by e-sellers using PrestaShop software.
module.additional_description: Blue Media S.A. BluePayment plugin enables quick and secure acceptance of online payments by e-sellers using PrestaShop software. Install the plugin, provide your clients with their favourite payment channels and develop your online sales.  How do you benefit from installing the BluePayment plugin? Thanks to easy and straightforward integration with our Blue Media payment gateway, you obtain the possibility of accepting online payments from the clients of your online store. The installation and configuration process is very simple. In only a few minutes time you can give your clients the possibility of paying for their purchases via their favorite channels. The funds paid by them will be credited directly to your account on a day + 1 basis.  What will your clients gain? First of all, the possibility of safe and convenient online shopping. Blue Media payment gateway allows you to use the most popular payment methods, including fast Pay by Link, BLIK 0, card payment or payment by instalments. The key advantage is 100% payment security, which we can guarantee as a national payment institution providing modern payment solutions based on stable and proven technology used by banks and a number of other institutions.

module.name: klaviyops
module.description: Klaviyo helps brands grow by making it easy to learn more about customers and personalize their experience
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klaviyo helps brands grow by making it easy to learn more about customers and personalize their experience. With Klaviyo, brands can use customer data to send relevant email, text, and in-app messages that build stronger customer relationships.
module.additional_description: Increase customer engagementIncrease revenueIncrease revenue from owned channels (Email, SMS, in-app, and web) Save time building and sending emails Create automated communications across the entire customer journeyIntegrate with key marketing and operations applicationsManage messaging across web, in-app, email, and SMS in a single platform Grow your marketing list Learn more about your customersMaintain customer profiles based on their actions across multiple channels, all in one placeTest and optimize your emails and signup forms Understand your performance at any level Target the right audiences with precise segmentation

module.name: ps_facebook
module.description: Get the very best out of essential channels for building your business, namely Facebook and Instagram
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Get the very best out of essential channels for building your business, namely Facebook and Instagram. Embed Facebook’s ecosystem in your online store with total ease and start to activate new audiences, generate qualified traffic and boost your sales today.
module.additional_description: It offers a simple way to list your products on Facebook and Instagram, find potential buyers and measure your results. Visibility Find new customers: Get all the power of the Facebook Pixel boosted by the Conversions API to connect you with a new audience which is ready to buy. ATTRACT THE RIGHT AUDIENCE Increase your online store’s reach by introducing your products to Facebook and Instagram’s 1.7 billion daily users. IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF YOUR TRAFFIC Launch a targeted acquisition strategy using similar audiences and dynamic advertising. Attract new buyers by automatically creating impactful advertisements straight from your catalogue. Conversion Measure results: Measure your marketing and ads’ performance and get information about your website’s results and how your Facebook tools are generating traffic. TRANSFORM YOUR VISITORS INTO BUYERS You don’t need any coding skills to install and configure the Facebook pixel. Thanks to tracking, it’s easy to measure how effective your campaigns are, optimise your marketing strategy and boost your sales. ENHANCE YOUR BUYING EXPERIENCE Offer your customers a consistent brand experience. Invite them to explore your products and make orders without any hassle, on all devices, straight from your posts. Get rid of the last barriers to customer conversion by embedding Messenger conversations in your online store. Easy Connect with your existing Facebook assets, such as a Facebook product catalogue, Facebook pixel and Facebook page – or create some new ones! Once you have these resources in place, you will be able to access experiences such as Facebook Shops and dynamic advertisements and configure other code-free sales tools to help you sell your products. CENTRALISE ALL YOUR FACEBOOK ACCOUNTS Connect all your Facebook accounts to your PrestaShop store the easy way (including Facebook Business Manager, Facebook Pages, Ad Accounts and Instagram Business Accounts). SAVE TIME BY AUTOMATING YOUR PROCESSES Import your entire PrestaShop product catalogue onto Facebook and Instagram with ease. Your updates are automatically synchronised

module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: Prestashop Event Bus
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Prestashop Event Bus

module.name: usercentrics
module.description: Data privacy regulators are stepping up enforcement actions and many websites are still vulnerable. Is yours? Consent Management tools mitigate legal risks while securing your data capture
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Data privacy regulators are stepping up enforcement actions and many websites are still vulnerable. Is yours? Consent Management tools mitigate legal risks while securing your data capture.
module.additional_description: Don’t risk your advertising revenue and start your journey towards GDPR compliance now with a free 15-day-trial.  Data Privacy regulations and cookie laws are complex. Many businesses like you used to struggle with GDPR compliance. Data privacy regulators such as French Data Protection Authority CNIL are stepping up enforcement actions and many websites are still vulnerable. What about yours? Your data quality is our priority. A compliant Consent Management tool helps mitigate legal risk, secure data capture and increase revenue - by collecting, managing and documenting the consent of your website visitors in a legally compliant way and making sure opt-in rates can easily be optimized. As you know, since the GDPR came into effect in May 2018, data obtained without consent may not be used for marketing purposes. Many businesses are finding out that working with us can relieve stress and increase advertising revenue. Don’t risk losing valuable data and ad revenue and get started now. It’s the fast and easy way to become GDPR-compliant! Your one-stop shop cookie banner solution: Your fully customizable banner design and messageCustomize your banner design in accordance with your CI and choose your design from a selection of different layouts (available for the Business Version) and banner message (available for the Standard Version). Obtain consent in accordance with the lawAchieve legal compliance with all common requirements. Take advantage of the provided step-by-step guidance and built-in resources to find peace of mind regarding compliance.No data lossKeep benefiting digital marketing opportunities and avoid any loss of advertising revenue.Compatibility with all common marketing toolsContinue to use all your existing marketing tools such as Analytics, A/B Testing, Tracking and Retargeting - and be compliant at the same timeAutomatically identify implemented technologies when installing the CMP using our ScannerDetect all technologies that are being used on your website and always have a full overview of them.

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.name: zencom
module.description: ZEN is a cost-effective, secure payment platform that ensures a peaceful shopping experience to users worldwide
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ZEN is a cost-effective, secure payment platform that ensures a peaceful shopping experience to users worldwide. Our payment platform comes with a number of benefits to expand your online business internationally and to new audiences.
module.additional_description: Payment methodsThanks to ZEN, you can start accepting over 30 payment methods. Scale your business to new global markets and let anyone buy from you.  Integrated IBAN accountZEN integrates all payment options within your account. Your earnings get wired to your account in seconds instead of hours or days, and you can use it right away.  Simple, fair rulesWe know that large-scale payment processing can get expensive, that’s why we promote a clear 0% ZEN FEE policy. At ZEN there’s just one monthly subscription. You don’t pay extra for incoming transactions – only for payment operators.   Chargeback protectionChargeback protection. ZEN minimizes the risk of chargebacks and unexpected fees that can really put a strain on your online selling performance.

module.name: taxdoo
module.displayName: - TAXDOO: The automated VAT solution for e-commerce –
module.description: Automated value added tax and financial accounting for e-commerce – Taxdoo offers you an all-in-one solution: From automated data collection and calculation of your tax liabilities to VAT regist
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automated value added tax and financial accounting for e-commerce – Taxdoo offers you an all-in-one solution: From automated data collection and calculation of your tax liabilities to VAT registrations and fillings in other EU countries.
module.additional_description: With this module online merchants can maintain an overview of all VAT processes throughout the EU and UK. Once your existing Taxdoo account is connected with your Prestashop online shop, your transaction data is collected fully automatically and updated on a daily basis – manual uploads are not necessary. Through the automated evaluation and monitoring of the transaction data, our system recognizes the respective European VAT liabilities and clearly displays them in your client dashboard.Our local tax consultant network takes care of all your VAT registrations and corresponding VAT filings throughout the EU and UK. This means that you, as well as your tax consultant, can maintain an overview at all times as the VAT processed transaction data can be effortlessly transferred to financial accounting. Submitting VAT returns via One-Stop-Shop is also made easy with Taxdoo. At Taxdoo we provide you a comprehensive all-in-one solution!

module.name: gamiphy

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.additional_description: Boost your Prestashop store salesMotivate your customers to make purchases with pointsIncrease recurring purchases25%+  conversion rate optimization5X customer engagementAcquire new customersEarn your customer's loyaltyCreate Live selling sessions and promotions for products you want to sellShare your games on social media channels

module.name: dhlefn
module.description: With the official DHL Fulfillment App you benefit from a quick & simple process enabling you to manage your warehouse and shipping activities to your customers across Europe
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With the official DHL Fulfillment App you benefit from a quick & simple process enabling you to manage your warehouse and shipping activities to your customers across Europe. You can run your eCommerce activities through one single integration.
module.additional_description: The DHL Fulfillment network will let you meet increasing end-customer needs while balancing your costs. If you want to grow your business across Europe you will benefit from DHL’s unparalleled experience and physical footprint in European logistics.

module.name: tidiolivechat
module.displayName: Chatbots, Live Chat and Messenger by Tidio
module.description: Tidio is a customer service platform that allows you to actively generate more sales thanks to a live chat solution boosted with chatbots. It seamlessly integrates with Messenger, Instagram and email
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Tidio is a customer service platform that allows you to actively generate more sales thanks to a live chat solution boosted with chatbots. It seamlessly integrates with Messenger, Instagram and email.Trusted by 300,000+ businesses
module.additional_description: Provide the best possible customer service and increase your sales. Tidio is a multichannel customer support tool for instant communication with your website visitors and customers. With live chat and chatbots, you can answer their questions in an instant and solve problems faster. Using Tidio will improve your customer’s experience, increase their loyalty and as a result, increase your conversion rate. And yes - it is available for free. What makes Tidio so effective in generating sales? As many as 75% of online customers said they expect help within five minutes. Integrate your live chat, email inbox, Messenger, and Instagram into one multichannel communicator and answer your customers in an instant!Ready-to-use chatbot templates for answering repetitive questions and performing simple tasks. What’s more—we have used machine learning to make your bot understand your customer’s intentions.Actionable statistics that show how effective and useful for your customer are your chatbotsLive visitors’ list that shows who is visiting your website in real-time and allows you to monitor which part of your website they are browsing What differentiates Tidio? Simplicity—it takes only 5 minutes to install the chat widget and start conversations with your customers300.000 businesses generated 20M leads and $500M additional revenueUnique chatbot builder - 100% codeless.Built-in chatbot templates empowered with AICustomizable, beautifully designed widgetIntegrations with email, Messenger, InstagramA free mobile app for iOS and AndroidExcellent customer support available for you 24/5 Sample tactics you can implement in 5 minutes to boost your sales: Stop 60% of customers from abandoning their carts by offering a discount or free shippingWelcome every website visitor and encourage them to make purchases by giving personalized discounts o informing them about special offersSend a personalized message to those who want to leave your websiteWelcome returning visitors and customers with a personalized messageMonitor visitor activity and recommend best-selling productsRun upselling bot to increase the average order value Numbers behind Tidio The 4th most popular live chat solution with over 300.000+ active users20M leads generated and $500M additional revenue with TidioThousands of positive reviews 20+ built-in, ready to use chatbots24/5 support to solve your problems and help you improve your business with Tidio

module.name: ritmoinsights
module.description: Growth analytics platform for e-commerce entrepreneurs.RITMO Insights helps e-commerce entrepreneurs make business decisions by analyzing their financial, revenue, marketing, and cash flow metrics
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Growth analytics platform for e-commerce entrepreneurs.RITMO Insights helps e-commerce entrepreneurs make business decisions by analyzing their financial, revenue, marketing, and cash flow metrics.
module.additional_description: ConnectConnect all your technical and business stack in less than 5 minutes and enjoy the pleasure of having all your KPIs in one place. AnalyzeFocus on data analysis and say goodbye to spending hours building complex visualizations. AutomateForget about extracting data and updating spreadsheets by hand. We take care of everything. Save moneySave yourself the cost of third-party tools to extract the metrics that really matter to your business.
